p: Moreover, the presence of d-limonene, an anti-fungal and antibacterial agent, makes orange oil a useful ingredient also for bio-pesticide formulations [ 144]. Finally, it is interesting to notice that waste orange peel, in addition to d-limonene, contains also other bioactive terpenes like linalool, and myrcene [ 145]. Besides orange peel, these terpenes can be found also in the peel of other citrus fruits such as lemon and several lime species [ 146], providing a good basis for the exploitation of this kind of wastes.
